milea.title: Milea Bee Farm
milea.description: Milea Bee Farm is located on Kurba Road, Lipa Batangas, about 21 km away from Batangas City. The farm attracts many visitors due to its authenticity and serene environment and is one of the top farm destinations in the Philippines. The farm does not feel like a tourist trap as it advocates bee propagation, beekeeping education, and agricultural sustainability
